1.name: The Power of the Dog
1.description: Charismatic rancher Phil Burbank inspires fear and awe in those around him. When his brother brings home a new wife and her son, Phil torments them until he finds himself exposed to the possibility of love.

2.name: Spider-Man: No Way Home
2.description: With Spider-Man's identity now revealed, Peter asks Doctor Strange for help. When a spell goes wrong, dangerous foes from other worlds start to appear, forcing Peter to discover what it truly means to be Spider-Man.

3.name: The Matrix Resurrections
3.description: Return to a world of two realities: one, everyday life; the other, what lies behind it. To find out if his reality is a construct, to truly know himself, Mr. Anderson will have to choose to follow the white rabbit once more.

4.name: West Side Story
4.description: An adaptation of the 1957 musical, West Side Story explores forbidden love and the rivalry between the Jets and the Sharks, two teenage street gangs of different ethnic backgrounds.

5.name: House of Gucci
5.description: When Patrizia Reggiani, an outsider from humble beginnings, marries into the Gucci family, her unbridled ambition begins to unravel their legacy and triggers a reckless spiral of betrayal, decadence, revenge, and ultimately...murder.

6.name: The Last Duel
6.description: King Charles VI declares that Knight Jean de Carrouges settle his dispute with his squire by challenging him to a duel.

7.name: Dune: Part One
7.description: Feature adaptation of Frank Herbert's science fiction novel about the son of a noble family entrusted with the protection of the most valuable asset and most vital element in the galaxy.

8.name: Don't Look Up
8.description: Two low-level astronomers must go on a giant media tour to warn mankind of an approaching comet that will destroy planet Earth.

9.name: The Unforgivable
9.description: A woman is released from prison after serving a sentence for a violent crime and re-enters a society that refuses to forgive her past.

10.name: Ghostbusters: Afterlife
10.description: When a single mom and her two kids arrive in a small town, they begin to discover their connection to the original Ghostbusters and the secret legacy their grandfather left behind.

11.name: Single All the Way
11.description: Desperate to avoid his family's judgment about his perpetual single status, Peter convinces his best friend Nick to join him for the holidays and pretend that they're now in a relationship.

12.name: Encanto
12.description: A young Colombian girl has to face the frustration of being the only member of her family without magical powers.

13.name: Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse - Part One
13.description: Miles Morales returns for the next chapter of the Oscar®-winning Spider-Verse saga, an epic adventure that will transport Brooklyn's full-time, friendly neighborhood Spider-Man across the ...                See full summary »

14.name: Home Alone
14.description: An eight-year-old troublemaker must protect his house from a pair of burglars when he is accidentally left home alone by his family during Christmas vacation.

15.name: No Time to Die
15.description: James Bond has left active service. His peace is short-lived when Felix Leiter, an old friend from the CIA, turns up asking for help, leading Bond onto the trail of a mysterious villain armed with dangerous new technology.

16.name: Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings
16.description: Shang-Chi, the master of weaponry-based Kung Fu, is forced to confront his past after being drawn into the Ten Rings organization.

17.name: Licorice Pizza
17.description: The story of Alana Kane and Gary Valentine growing up, running around and going through the treacherous navigation of first love in the San Fernando Valley, 1973.

18.name: Red Notice
18.description: An Interpol agent tracks the world's most wanted art thief.

19.name: Eternals
19.description: The saga of the Eternals, a race of immortal beings who lived on Earth and shaped its history and civilizations.

20.name: A Boy Called Christmas
20.description: In this origin story of Father Christmas, an ordinary boy (with a loyal pet mouse and a reindeer at his side) sets out on an extraordinary adventure to find his father who is on a quest to discover the fabled village of Elfhelm.

21.name: National Lampoon's Christmas Vacation
21.description: The Griswold family's plans for a big family Christmas predictably turn into a big disaster.

22.name: Silent Night
22.description: Nell, Simon, and their son Art are ready to welcome friends and family for what promises to be a perfect Christmas gathering. Perfect except for one thing: everyone is going to die.

23.name: Venom: Let There Be Carnage
23.description: Eddie Brock attempts to reignite his career by interviewing serial killer Cletus Kasady, who becomes the host of the symbiote Carnage and escapes prison after a failed execution.

24.name: tick, tick...BOOM!
24.description: On the cusp of his 30th birthday, a promising young theater composer navigates love, friendship and the pressures of life as an artist in New York City.

25.name: Resident Evil: Welcome to Raccoon City
25.description: Set in 1998, this origin story explores the secrets of the mysterious Spencer Mansion and the ill-fated Raccoon City.

26.name: Love Actually
26.description: Follows the lives of eight very different couples in dealing with their love lives in various loosely interrelated tales all set during a frantic month before Christmas in London, England.

27.name: West Side Story
27.description: Two youngsters from rival New York City gangs fall in love, but tensions between their respective friends build toward tragedy.

28.name: Nightmare Alley
28.description: An ambitious carny with a talent for manipulating people with a few well-chosen words hooks up with a female psychiatrist who is even more dangerous than he is.

29.name: Last Night in Soho
29.description: An aspiring fashion designer is mysteriously able to enter the 1960s where she encounters a dazzling wannabe singer. But the glamour is not all it appears to be and the dreams of the past start to crack and splinter into something darker.

30.name: A Castle for Christmas
30.description: To escape a scandal, a bestselling author journeys to Scotland, where she falls in love with a castle - and faces off with the grumpy duke who owns it.

31.name: Encounter
31.description: Two brothers embark on a journey with their father, who is trying to protect them from an alien threat.

32.name: Belfast
32.description: A young boy and his working-class Belfast family experience the tumultuous late 1960s.

33.name: The Matrix
33.description: When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence.

34.name: Spencer
34.description: During her Christmas holidays with the royal family at the Sandringham estate in Norfolk, England, Diana Spencer, struggling with mental health problems, decides to end her decade-long marriage to Prince Charles.

35.name: The French Dispatch
35.description: A love letter to journalists set in an outpost of an American newspaper in a fictional twentieth century French city that brings to life a collection of stories published in "The French Dispatch Magazine".

36.name: How the Grinch Stole Christmas
36.description: On the outskirts of Whoville lives a green, revenge-seeking Grinch who plans to ruin Christmas for all of the citizens of the town.

37.name: King Richard
37.description: A look at how tennis superstars Venus and Serena Williams became who they are after the coaching from their father Richard Williams.

38.name: Sonic the Hedgehog 2
38.description: Sequel to the 2020 live-action feature film 'Sonic the Hedgehog'.

39.name: Love Hard
39.description: An LA girl, unlucky in love, falls for an East Coast guy on a dating app and decides to surprise him for the holidays, only to discover that she's been catfished. This lighthearted romantic comedy chronicles her attempt to reel in love.

40.name: Free Guy
40.description: A bank teller discovers that he's actually an NPC inside a brutal, open world video game.

41.name: Elf
41.description: Raised as an over-sized elf, a human travels from the North Pole to NYC to meet his biological father who doesn't know he exists and is in desperate need of some Christmas spirit.

42.name: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
42.description: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe, and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.

43.name: 8-Bit Christmas
43.description: In 1980s Chicago, a 10-year-old sets out on a quest to get the Christmas gift of his generation: the latest and greatest video-game system.

44.name: Being the Ricardos
44.description: Follows Lucy and Desi as they face a crisis that could end their careers and another that could end their marriage.

45.name: It's a Wonderful Life
45.description: An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like if he had never existed.

46.name: Die Hard
46.description: An NYPD officer tries to save his wife and several others taken hostage by German terrorists during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles.

47.name: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
47.description: An orphaned boy enrolls in a school of wizardry, where he learns the truth about himself, his family and the terrible evil that haunts the magical world.

48.name: The Santa Clause
48.description: When a man inadvertently makes Santa fall off of his roof on Christmas Eve, he finds himself magically recruited to take his place.

49.name: The King's Man
49.description: In the early years of the 20th century, the Kingsman agency is formed to stand against a cabal plotting a war to wipe out millions.

50.name: Black Widow
50.description: Natasha Romanoff confronts the darker parts of her ledger when a dangerous conspiracy with ties to her past arises.
